Monday's game is the first time these teams square off this season.
The New York Mets host the Boston Red Sox to start a three-game series.
Brandon Nimmo has 23 doubles, three triples and 18 home runs for the Mets.
Jarren Duran is 12-for-38 with four doubles and four home runs over the last 10 games.
Ceddanne Rafaela has 20 doubles, four triples, 14 home runs and 63 RBI for the Red Sox.
Red Sox: 3-7, .199 batting average, 3.24 ERA, outscored by 10 runs in the last 10 games.
Francisco Lindor is 13-for-43 with four doubles and four home runs over the last 10 games.
Mets: 7-3, .249 batting average, 3.10 ERA, outscored opponents by 14 runs in the last 10 games.
Luis Severino stated that every series had become 'a must-win series' for the rest of the year.
The Mets look to take another series from a Sox themed ballclub, as they host the Red Sox for three in Queens.
